comment: Dr. Wilson is a great Professor he will tutor you if you need extra help. There is no homework, he mainly lectures. He doesnt use PowerPoints much. He mainly teaches by explaining using reasoning. He is test/quiz heavy. You will have to study hard outside of class, if you dont you wont pass! Dont miss class, study, and you will do great!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Wonderful professor.. I took him for math 3316 and 3317. I wish I could have took him for math 3318. I don't like math, but I loved coming to his class. If he sees that the class is struggling, he gives opportunities for us to improve our grade. He is down to earth and answers your emails fast. His teaching is also easy to follow:)

Wonderful professor.... He has sort of a smart mouth but it's funny. It seems like he cares more about if you put in effort than the actual grade you receive. I took him for math 3316 and 3317. I wish I could have took him for 3318. I don't mind him bring a little tough because he teaches well and I didn't feel like I had to self teach.

Dr. Wilson is one of the best math teachers that I've had. He answers emails super fast. I think he cares more about if you try to pass and put in effort than the actual grade you received. He has even helped me in other math classes. He is down to earth and and has sort of a smart mouth but it's funny.

Dr. Wilson is an awesome professor!  You do have to study and work hard for a  good grade, but you will be glad you did.  He is very helpful and he will answer any question that you have with out making you feel dumb for asking :)  He does not require home work, but work out the answers in the back of the book anyway and you will be fine!

Dr. Wilson is kind of intimidating at first, but he is really a good teacher. He cares if you understand the math AND can teach it. Considering that he is one of the deans, he is funny and pretty laid back. Just dont sit in the in the front of the class room, he likes to call on you when you dont know the answer:)
He is very easy to talk to but the class is harder than I thought. He is a good friend but not teacher. Take him with extreme caution.

Dr. Wilson was great.  Yes you must attend.  He made me feel like I really could teach elementary math.  The class was challenaging and informative.  Really made you think, but it helped in understanding.  Made an A and worked for it!  I would take him again!

Awesome professor! Great summer class to take. At first his class sounds like a lot of work, but it is really easy and not very time consuming. 3 group projects, 4 quizes, 1 test, 5 reflections, a take home final, and an inclass final. Defiantly recommend him for summer!
Amazing professor! I learned sooo much in his class. Easy A! I would def take his class again.
he seemed firm but quite tolerant. He's very professional in his teaching appraoch and very realistic. he's a good teacher
He is so ****ed and he needs to be fired!!!
Terrible professor. Cocky, picks favorites, very unclear on assignments, not approachable. I can honestly say I did not learn anything from this class. If possible take 2204 with someone else.

His class was pretty good.  He seems intimidating, but he's a wonderful person one on one.  The quizzes were easy if you read the chapters and the group projects were fun.  A lot of work, so I wouldn't recommend taking it on just one night (like I did).

He can be kind of unclear with the assignments....but almost all of the work is group work, so the students help more than the teacher. He gives unannounced quizzes. But if you study a lot and work well in groups, then you shouldn't have a problem.
